content:
Doctor Strange is a visually stunning film that explores the mystical side of the Marvel Universe. The movie's unique blend of magic, action, and humor makes it a fascinating watch. Benedict Cumberbatch brings the character to life in a fantastic way, and the supporting cast, including Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams, and Tilda Swinton, add depth to the story.

If you're re-watching Doctor Strange, you might appreciate the film's connections to the larger Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Pay attention to the references to other Marvel movies, like the Avengers and the Infinity Stones, which set the stage for Doctor Strange's appearances in later films like Thor: Ragnarok, Avengers: Infinity War, and Avengers: Endgame.

After re-watching Doctor Strange, you might be excited to know that a sequel, Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, is coming to theaters in May 2023. It promises to be an even more mind-bending adventure, with Sam Raimi directing and Elizabeth Olsen's Wanda Maximoff (Scarlet Witch) playing a significant role.

Enjoy your re-watch of Doctor Strange, and then get back to your anime on Crunchyroll!
